###Context###The UK's Early Years Foundation Stage framework recommends that educational programmes must involve activities and experiences for children, as set out under each of the areas of learning described below.

##Areas of Learning###
{areas_of_learning_text}

###Instructions###
I am an early years educator and I am working with children 3-4 years old. I will describe you a situation in the ###Description### section. Please propose two conversation ideas and several games and crafts ideas I could do with the children to extend their learning.

Types of activities:
- Conversations: Asking them questions about the topic
- Games and Crafts: Puzzles, games, role play, arts and crafts

###Activity examples###
Take inspiration from the following examples:

{activity_examples}
